dag |de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin
pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang /
lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar
byas| ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin
pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse
zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta
na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed
de| nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u stobs
ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma
dang | zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par
gyur to/ /de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig
go /de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan
pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden
pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas
phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig
pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar
gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang
dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smras pa'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod
pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung
la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/
dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
'gyur te/ lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung
ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung
ste| de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na brten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad
nas| shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku
gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs
te| mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to/ /phyis re zhig na khyim bdag gcig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i
nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi lde gu til mar
dang sbyar ba phul te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi
mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs
ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid
mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gang par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par
dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las
gcig tu nges par gang pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //sdug gu
zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon
rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir
byas| bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongs su
'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig
tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang
zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par
gyur to/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnam na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying
du sdug pas na/ khye'u 'di'i ming sdug gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'i sdug gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru
ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyi sa 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo
byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan
pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can/ bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong
ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/ /de nas phyis re
zhig na khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang
po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag
tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te chos nyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyid shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga ba'i 'khor
ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
bar rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral
bar gyur nas/ gser dang / /bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i
sbubs bcom nas/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po
dang | nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sdug gus las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rab
tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs
rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sdug gu nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa
de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / /
me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ las dge ba dang / las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal ba brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin
par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa
dang | zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs
rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas
rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug
tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/ me tog rnam pa sna
tshogs 'byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig cig gis rgyal po la gsol to/ /bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags
par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas khyim bdag de dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna
tshogs sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog bdags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed nas/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
sdug gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des ni/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug pa'i yid du 'ong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid
kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par
smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren
ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig
tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong
de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang /
klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas
bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan
pa| rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//
de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la
mdzes pa/ mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i
kha dog can du byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di'i mig pad+ma 'dra
bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma
'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nying khu dang /
gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/
bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/
gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ de gang dag/ gang du 'gro ba de dang / der lha dang / mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad+ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/
'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu des
bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa
rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
can yin par rtsad chod te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas /
gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo tsha bar
gyur to/ /de nas pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad
du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu| 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che med par bya mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong de dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ pad+ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di chi par grags pa dang / dgra
bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba'
rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan dag su zhig gis
nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
dang | rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
so| |de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re
zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas nor bu chen po mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod
rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char kheb la btags nas/ de'i mthus phyogs
dang | phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bur 'dug par byas so/ /me tog pad+ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag
gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma'i mig yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi
mchod rten la nor bu rin po cha btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo / /pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/ mig pad+ma sngon
po lta bur gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin
pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni
rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar
ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po
rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas
na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga'
mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs
bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ che bar grags pa/ bya ka la ping ka ltar skad snyan pa/ rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/
khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta ba'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags
so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u rnga sgra pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad
la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings
te| mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje
can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtong ba la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go /de nas phyi zhig na khye'u
rnga sgra shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des
bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
go |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba
de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/
pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i
'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
pa| rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang
dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/ des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par
gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za
bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas
shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las
dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las
rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu
rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang
gnyen ldan rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhing na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing
zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku
gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/ /der srog
chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mi las rol
mo bslabs te/ mchod rten de la phul nas/ de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti byed do/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta
bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig
tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par smin pa'ang
'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig
la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do// //bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi
rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am
ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
dang | mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las
chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon te/ bu btsas nas sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa gzhan dag dang / g.yog 'khor dang / nye du
rnams kyis de mthong nas/ 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas
nas| sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ 'di ci yin/ su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snyam mo/ /de nas de'i blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams
cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ da bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyod ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chug
la| zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag pa brims te/ 'o mas kyang yang dang / yang du gtor cig dang / de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de
dag thams cad tshad po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bsams pa/ bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur
ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta
na sdug la mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go /de nas re zhig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang / de
dag thams cad byad gzugs dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i
'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed
do| |dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos
nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden
pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor
ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
nas gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig
pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gzhon
nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyi sngon tshe rabs
gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing
bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i
khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang /
skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la
bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i lha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi
ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod
rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar
bar 'gro bar gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang / de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/ de dag tu lhan cig tu
til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/ me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang bsnyen bkur byas nas/ lhan cig tu smon lam btab ba/ bdag cag gang dang / gang du
skyes pa de dang / der spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lto gcig kho na nas byung bar gyur cig /tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang / byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig /ma 'ongs pa'i
dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/ de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti byas pa des na/ 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs
kyi shugs thob par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu mthun par rab tu byung bar rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig
tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar ba
bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ dge slong dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya ba/
bam po bcu drug pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
dang | tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am
ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas
dang | gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bcas pa/ yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs

so| |de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de
zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/ de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi
ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/ de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so/ /de nas pha ma dang / khyim de na gnas pa'i
g.yog 'khor rnams dang / nye du rnams dang / ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas
ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du
snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u nyi ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i
ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa/ gtong ba la
sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs pa brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par
byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la
sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bdag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/
des khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin
pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa
thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid
mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems
dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil par gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus
par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang / khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la/ lkog 'phyas
byed de/ de 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
nas| bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis
par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu/ 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na/ med par byar mi nus so/ /de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa
rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad
gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i
las de dag byas shing bsags pas na nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags
pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba
dang | mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu cu rtsa
gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de
rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/
shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i
sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig
brtsigs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/ bram ze dang /
khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams
kyis mchod pa byed do/ /de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang / rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ /de nas de dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khebs la btags te/ zhabs la phyag btsal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong
ba 'dis na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /nor bu rin po che
'di lta bu yan spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
na| cho lo la ngor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che rtags pa des
na| 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la/ rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de
ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'ang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig
tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab
par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gyad kyi ba dan
zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
dang | ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto
'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims
cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i
tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma
la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas
te| gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs so/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma
dang | ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ /khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan
bsgrengs so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig
rten thams cad grags pas rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i
ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho
dang | mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grags par
gyur to/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa zhig
go /de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba
lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ /dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su
chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang / rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin te/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing
phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/ pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i
'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam pa 'thor ba dang / rnam |par 'jig pa'i chos
can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dang bral
bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs
bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/
dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de yang gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol
ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do/ /gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong spyod de/ gsol ba btab
ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags
kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrengs nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa
nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag
gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang
me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye
mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du
smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten
kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas/ mtho ris dang / thar
par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyi ba dan dag
bsgreng ngo / /de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang / des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas/ des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rol mo'i
sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/ ba dan
de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig /ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par
byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags
'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na/ 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas myong bar gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyi de ltar yang
dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag par
'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/ rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/ sdom gyi tshigs
su brjod pa bdun pa rdzogs so// //sdom ni/ 'od bzang ma dang rab sdug ma/ /dkar mo zla ba ut+pa la/ /mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang / /ka tsang ga la
bde byed ma/ /mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan/ /'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod
sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
byas| mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
pa| nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe
mnyan du yod pa na/ tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor
dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las
chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa/ nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig
btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes zer

ro| |de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ ma ma brgyad
kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang / yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye
drag par gyur to/ /bu mo de'ang dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang / su 'ongs
kyang rung ba de dang / de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/ /byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar
gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / /tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo / /de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/
de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni/ gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /de nas
re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ yab/ ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/ des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/ /de nas phyis bu
mo de na re/ yab/ thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang / da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro/ /de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal
rgyal la gsol nas/ /mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyi/ khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis
shig ces byas so/ /de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/ chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so/ /de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed
cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang par bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams
la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na bas so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag phyir log go /bu mo 'od bzang
ma'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / reng bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste /
des bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa'ang bsgrubs so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
te| |btsun pa/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag
kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par
'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal
byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/ mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/ 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/ de dag gis bzung bar byas
so| |de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsnyegs pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam
pa sna tshogs bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/ de nas de dag gis lha dang / mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong
ngo| |mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag btsal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru/ mar spyon/ sru/ mar spyon/ khyod kyis chos 'di lta
bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so/ /de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas/ /skye bo phal po che'i gung la
'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la
gtad de/ des de rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ /de nas des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi
brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs
pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang / bong bar mnyam
pa| nam mkha' dang / lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon
par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang
dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'od bzang mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul pa nas kyang
nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'od bzang ma
nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams
ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang /
mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams
ni| |bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab ba na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu
rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal
po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/
shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das
de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig
yod pa zhig brtsigs so/ /de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te/ mchod
rten de la phul lo/ /de nas zhabs la phyag btsal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis
na| bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rnam pa sna
tshogs btags pa de na/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /smon lam btab pa des ni da
ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par gnag
par 'gyur ro/ /las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'ang
'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar
ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi
rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams
dang | blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams
dang | gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/
ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shas
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyan gsos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes
pa| nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so| |de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu lon pa na bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/
yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa mnyam du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug ma zhig btsas so/ /de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston
byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re/ bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug
ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ /de'ang tshe rabs dran te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung / /zhing gi khyad par bzhi
las 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/ /dad pas lha mi'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/ /de nas de'i pha ma dang / gzhan yang /
khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing sdangs te/ mi dga' bar gyur la/ skyi bung zhes byed nas smras pa/ kye ma/ bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig
go |des smras pa/ yum/ bdag ni sha za mo'ang ma lags/ srin mo'ang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te/ sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i mas khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo des 'di skad mchi'o zhes bsnyad do/ /de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs 'don du bcug go /de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe/ pha ma la
gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang / snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /
re zhig na/ de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang / btung ba med pas shi'o/ /de nas der
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la rab sdug ma la/ nga na re/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi
bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du
song nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams la zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal chags
stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab tu sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas
bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so/ /de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so/ /de nas re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas
sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste/ smras pa/ rab sdug ma/ gar 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyi/ khyod
kyis bya ma dgos so/ /rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te/ yab bden pa mthong ba lags so/ sa'i 'og thog thag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs
na sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ /de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun
mo phreng rgyud ma dang / rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang / btsun mo 'khor gyi bla brang srong sbyin dang / gna' mi dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal
rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so/ /de nas nags khung du song nas der mi yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/ /de
ltar skabs phye nas kyang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang /
gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang / bsgrub ba dang / 'bad bas phol
mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam
par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tsan+dan spangs ba lta bur bsil
bar gyur ba/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i
rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su
gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos gos mdzad de/ chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ nyan
thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so/ /de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas/ 'o
brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to/ /de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas drol bab na rgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to/ /de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par
smin pa yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas lhas lha'i bdud
rtsis bkang ngo / /de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nga'i nyan kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma rab sdug ma 'di yin no/ /de nas
dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcun pa/ rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug
po'i rigs su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rab sdug nyid kyis sngon che rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa'
rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phye rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i
khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung
po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs
shing dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri
thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na
med pa/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ drang srong smra ba ri dwags
kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/
dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs ring byas te/ mdun du bdar nas wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang
bcas te skyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro/ /de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te/ jo
bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag gzhug ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas/ de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa/
bdag la rje bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyi/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas des gsad pa dang / bcing ba
dang | brdeg pa dang / bsdos nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so/ /de nas
tshod dpon gyi thad du song ba dang / re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang / tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/ /de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab
